services_air_sea_desc: Yellow provides reliable air and sea freight services tailored for customers and businesses. Air delivery with a 7-10 day shipping time is the best option for customers wishing to send parcels to Uzbekistan. Meanwhile, sea freight can take up to 45 days but offers a more cost-effective solution for shipping larger and heavier commercial cargo.
